name: Classic Saturday
description: Classic Saturday is a 2D top-down view game, in which the players fight themselves with house furniture in order to be the strongest roommate. This is for 2-4 players mapped for PS4 & Xbox controllers. Victory music isn't ours. Controls : - Left joystick= move the player - Right joystick = choose the direction where to shoot - L1 = grab an object - L2 = throw an object To win points you have to stay in the circle.
